Translations.Text: Vos noted those received portion scripture ac quam they believe in idolatry false doctrine tunc dictus disbelievers est bene guided than believers
est they incurred deus condemnation whomever DEUS condemns vos non invenit any helper eum
they suus share sovereignty? they perfecit they non dedit people grain
Est they envious de people because DEUS showered them His blessings? Nos dedit Abraham's familia scripture wisdom; nos granted them major authority
Some de them believed therein some de them repelled therefrom Hell est unus just retribution pro these
Surely those disbelieve noster revelations nos condemn them hellfire. Whenever their skins burnt nos dedit them new skins Sic they suffer continuously. DEUS est Almighty Wise
Prout pro those believe lead righteous vita nos admit them gardens flowing streams they abide therein forever They habet pure conjux therein. Nos admit them blissful shade
DEUS commands VOS dedit anything people entrusted VOS. Vos scabinus among the people vos scabinus equitably. Bonus enlightenment indeed est quod DEUS recommends vos. DEUS est Hearer Seer
O vos believe vos obey DEUS vos obey messenger those in charge vos! Vos dispute any matter vos refer it DEUS messenger vos believe in DEUS Extremum Feria. Hoc est bonus vos provisus vos bene solution
